sense.def:
To toss something somewhere
pomeni nekaj vreči nekam lahkotno in brez preudarka.

seg.quote: He took the bag and tossed it into some nearby bushes.

sense.def:
To toss a coin
pomeni sprejeti neko odločitev tako, da v zrak vržemo kovanec in ugibamo, katera stran bo obrnjena navzgor, ko bo padel.

seg.quote: They used the penny to toss for the first round of drinks.
Business deals were clinched by the toss of a coin.

sense.def:
To toss one's head
pomeni sunkovito premakniti glavo nazaj.

seg.quote: ‘No,’ she said, tossing her head in disgust.
She gave a toss of her head.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
tosses
, se vztrajno premika z ene strani na drugo in nazaj.

seg.quote: I tossed and turned all night.
